data.title: Triangle Shorthand
data.statement:
(I changed to just Reverse mode, per 5DN1Lâ€™s advice)

Given the following short input, tease out the 3 bits of info you need to make the whole triangle.

(This Clash purposely does not spell out all the details)

data.inputDescription: <<Line1:>> A string that is 3-4 characters long

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

(I changed to just Reverse mode, per 5DN1L’s advice)

Given the following short input, tease out the 3 bits of info you need to make the whole triangle.

(This Clash purposely does not spell out all the details)
Input
Line1: A string that is 3-4 characters long
Output
The resulting triangle
Constraints
Example
Input
bc8
Output
b
cc
ddd
eeee
fffff
gggggg
hhhhhhh
iiiiiiii
